    Method
    Description
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder.async()
    Configures the task to run asynchronously (off the main server thread).
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder.delay(long ticks)
    Sets an initial delay for the task before its first execution.
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder.group(String group)
    Assigns the task to a named group, allowing for group-based cancellation.
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder.repeat(long ticks)
    Configures the task to repeat with a specified period.
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder.run(Runnable runnable)
    Sets the Runnable to be executed by the task.
    SchedulerService.SchedulerTaskBuilder
    SchedulerService.task()
    Provides a builder for creating more complex scheduled tasks.
